text: Fotbal Club Rapid București is a Romanian association football club from Bucharest, Romania. It was founded in 1923 by a group of workers. Rapid won the Romanian championship three times (1967, 1999 and 2003) and the Romanian Cup 13 times. In the 2015–16 season, they were promoted to Liga I. == Honours == Liga I :*Winners (3): 1966–67, 1998–99, 2002–03 :*Runners-up (14): 1936–37, 1937–38, 1939–40, 1940–41, 1948–49, 1950, 1963–64, 1964–65, 1965–66, 1969–70, 1970–71, 1997–98, 1999–00, 2005–06 Liga II :*Winners (6): 1952, 1955, 1974–75, 1982–83, 1989–90, 2015–16 :*Runners-up (3): 1979–80, 1981–82, 2013–14 Cupa Eroilor (Heroes Cup) :*Winners (1): 1942 Cupa României :*Winners (13): 1934–35, 1936–37, 1937–38, 1938–39, 1939–40, 1940–41, 1941–42, 1971–72, 1974–75, 1997–98, 2001–02, 2005–06, 2006–07 :*Runners-up (6): 1960–61, 1961–62, 1967–68, 1994–95, 1998–99, 2011–12 Supercupa României :*Winners (4): 1999, 2002, 2003, 2007 :*Runners-up (2): 1998, 2006 ==References== == Other websites == *Official website of the club Category:Romanian football clubs Category:Organizations based in Bucharest Category:1923 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in Romania
title: FC Rapid București
